snippet.title: Thumb Tanks | Indie Game Trailers
snippet.description:
Annoy your friends and get awards for it: shoot, deploy mines, heal and use your tank's special ability to take the crown in this PVP-only split-screen game for up to four players. Collect medals and upgrade your tank after each round. Easy to learn, yet with tactical possibilities to explore.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2266360/Thumb_Tanks/
